citations.narrative:
No contingency plan, or annual review and training documentation on the plan, was available at the time of the inspection.
Written contingency plans identify tasks and personnel responsible in the event of emergencies that may adversely
impact animal welfare, and must be reviewed and trained upon annually to ensure that personnel are ready to respond to
an emergency. The facility must ensure that a written emergency plan is in place, and personnel are trained on it, and
that it is reviewed annually.
Correct by 23 April 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
No contingency plan, or annual review and training documentation on the plan, was available at the time of the inspection.  
Written contingency plans identify tasks and personnel responsible in the event of emergencies that may adversely 
impact animal welfare, and must be reviewed and trained upon annually to ensure that personnel are ready to respond to 
an emergency.  The facility must ensure that a written emergency plan is in place, and personnel are trained on it, and 
that it is reviewed annually. 
 
Correct by 23 April 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
